articles.title: Singapore Polytechnic student has Covid-19, some lab and practical classes from cohort to go online or be deferred - TODAYonline
articles.description: SINGAPORE — Some laboratory and practical classes in Singapore Polytechnic will go online or be deferred for two weeks after a student was confirmed to have contracted the coronavirus, it said in a statement on Sunday evening (May 16).
